badges.title: 68K Flamecarver
badges.description: Awarded for validating a RustChain block on Motorola 68000-series hardware. The same chips that fueled the Amiga, early Macs, and arcade glory — now reclaim the ledger.
badges.visual_anchor: Glowing DIP-package 68000 with faint traces of arcade trails and system beeps pulsing in flamefont
